title: Large-Scale Simulation-Based Lesson Study (Jugyō Kenkyū) Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary curriculum standards, language teaching experience, and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: A collaborative process for elementary school teachers to iteratively design and improve language lessons in VR environments, with activity-centered design using learner individual devices

learning_goals: Improve language lesson designs at least three times by applying the lesson study cycle
Implement lesson improvement plans based on peer feedback in VR simulation environments with over 80% execution rate
Explain lesson study designs that integrate cultural-historical activity theory and community of practice theory
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
